# GRAPHICS::GET_ASPECT_RATIO

## Summary
Returns the aspect ratio for the game

## Parameters
* **BOOL** physicalAspect:
Passing in true will return the physical aspect ratio of the game window (Useful for 3x1 modes).
False will return whatever the main game window aspect is.
This takes into account custom overrides from the settings menu.

## Returns
* **FLOAT**

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Returns the aspect ratio of game
